segments.text: I'm just observing the scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streams in through the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a pleasant day outside, I can see the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, things are certainly less calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing completely, water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands right in it, drying a plate with such focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water pooling around her feet at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious she is to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water is going to cause serious damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a shame to see such a common oversight cause such potential havoc.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the water just spilling everywhere is quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
